name: pdump
description: A tool to dump data from a pdk.io cloud system

scripts.prebuild: mkdir -p dist; cp package.json dist && cp -aR src dist && cd dist && npm i --production
scripts.prebuild:win-x64: cp dump.bat dist && mkdir -p dist/win-x64; cd dist/win-x64 && curl https://nodejs.org/dist/latest-v10.x/win-x64/node.exe -O
scripts.build:win-x64: cd dist && zip -r paneldump-0.1.1-win-x64.zip dump.bat win-x64/node.exe node_modules src

author: Joshua Perry <josh@pdk.io>
